name: TeamsWhats
description: This is a project where I made a simple social network called TeamsWhats. Project and practice of social media server, implementing the learning of backend and nodeJS.

scripts.start: pm2 start api && pm2 start cache && pm2 start mysql
scripts.stop: pm2 stop api && pm2 stop cache && pm2 stop mysql
scripts.delete: pm2 delete api && pm2 delete cache && pm2 delete mysql
scripts.fix: npm run prettier && npm run lint

author: Diana Carolina Campuzano Garz√≥n <dcaroli2015@gmail.com>
